code: import{useState,useEffect}from"react";import{getProgramAlumni}from"../api/Api";import{useGlobal}from"../context/GlobalContext";import{Container}from"react-bootstrap";import DaftarProgramAlumni from"../components/DaftarProgramAlumni";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";function ManajemenProgramAlumni(){const{globalData}=useGlobal();const username=globalData===null||globalData===void 0?void 0:globalData.username;const[program,setProgram]=useState([]);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(true);const[error,setError]=useState(null);useEffect(()=>{const fetchProgramAlumni=async()=>{setLoading(true);try{var _response$data;const response=await getProgramAlumni();const programArray=(response===null||response===void 0?void 0:(_response$data=response.data)===null||_response$data===void 0?void 0:_response$data.data)||[];if(Array.isArray(programArray)){const programData=programArray.filter(item=>item.authorName===username).map(item=>({id:item.id,image:item.image,authorId:item.authorId,title:item.title,content:item.description,createdAt:item.createdAt,category:item.category,authorName:item.authorName}));setProgram(programData);}else{console.error("Data yang diterima bukan array:",programArray);}}catch(err){setError("Gagal memuat berita, silakan coba lagi.");console.error("Error fetching berita:",err);}finally{setLoading(false);}};fetchProgramAlumni();},[username]);if(loading)return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:"Loading..."});if(error)return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:error});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Container,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"text-center",children:"MANAJEMEN PROGRAM ALUMNI"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("hr",{className:"custom-hr"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(DaftarProgramAlumni,{program:program})]});}export default ManajemenProgramAlumni;
